# WeUnityX - React Native Social Media App

## Project Overview
WeUnityX is a React Native social media application with Firebase backend integration. The app includes features for user authentication, posts, stories, events, messaging, and notifications.

## Architecture
- Frontend: React Native with Expo
- Backend: Firebase (Authentication, Firestore, Storage)
- Navigation: React Navigation v6
- State Management: React Context/Hooks

## Key Features
- User Authentication (Sign In/Up, Password Reset)
- Home Feed with Posts and Stories
- Events Creation and Management
- Real-time Messaging
- User Profiles and Settings
- Push Notifications
- Search and Discovery

## Development Guidelines
- Follow React Native best practices
- Use functional components with hooks
- Implement proper error handling
- Maintain consistent code style
- Use Firebase security rules
- Optimize for performance
